COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_DES: Connect a wallet to see this feature.
COMMON.NO_DEPOSIT_DES: Your balance of {symbol} is 0. Transfer {symbol} to your wallet to be able to deposit
COMMON.NO_BORROW_DES: You need to deposit some collateral first to unlock your borrowing power.
COMMON.GOVERNANCE-DES: Staking in the governance module allows bMXX holders to govern the Multi-Chain Markets and Reserves
COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_DEPOSIT_DES: Connect a wallet to deposit and see your balance in this dashboard.
COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_BORROW_DES: Connect a wallet to borrow and see your balance in this dashboard.
COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_HISTORY_DES: Connect a wallet to see your history in this dashboard.
COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_GOV_DES: Connect a wallet to see your governance in this dashboard.
COMMON.CONNECT_WALLET_REWARD_DES: Connect a wallet to see your reward in this dashboard.
COMMON.NO_LIQUIDITY_DESC: There is no available liquidity to borrow.
COMMON.NO_LIQUIDITY_DESC_WITHDRAW: There is no available liquidity to withdraw.
COMMON.HF_TOO_LOW_DESC: Deposit more collateral or repay part of your borrowings to increase your health factor and be able to borrow
COMMON.O_FEE_TITLE_DES: Users who want to borrow any of the supported digital assets from Multi-Chain Lend (MCL) must deposit collateral that will be locked on the protocol. These assets must be over-collateralized and will enable borrowing up to 75% of that collateral value. These collateral ratios are determined by the protocol and are controlled through the Governance process, which is documented in the Litepaper. Borrow cryptocurrencies and stable-coins with no credit check and fast origination directly on Binance Smart Chain. Borrow Fee starting at 0.001%
COMMON.O_FEE_TITLE_DES_MORE: For more information about fee, visit the {0}
COMMON.COLLATERAL_HINT_TITLE: Adding and removing assets as collateral
COMMON.COLLATERAL_HINT_DES: Decide whether to use a deposited asset as collateral. An asset used as collateral will affect your borrowing power and health factor.
COMMON.IR_HINT_DES_S: Your interest rate will stay the same for the duration of your loan. Recommended for long-term loan periods and for users who prefer predictability.
COMMON.IR_HINT_DES_V: Your interest rate will fluctuate based on the market. Recommended for short-term loans.

TABLE_COLUMNS.DEPOSIT_DES: To make a deposit, transfer any of these assets to your wallet
TABLE_COLUMNS.BORROW_DES: To borrow, deposit any of these assets into your wallet.
TABLE_COLUMNS.RECEIVE_IN:
User's Collateral
(Select a collateral to receive)
TABLE_COLUMNS.PAY_WITH:
User's Borrowing
(Select a collateral to pay)
TABLE_COLUMNS.NAME: Name

EMPTY.NO_BORROW_DESC: There will be a list of all the assets you borrowed. For now it’s empty until you start to borrow.
EMPTY.NO_DEPOSIT_DESC: There will be a list of all the assets you deposited and you are earning on. For now it’s empty until you start to deposit.
